data.comment: Today's referee, Kevin Dhondt, has blown to start the match.
Jeremy Doku is booked for the home team.
In the minute 41, The away team have replaced Benoit Poulain with Menno Koch. This is the first substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
The first half has been concluded at Lotto Park.
In the minute 58, Adriano for Eupen has been booked by Kevin Dhondt and receives a first yellow card.
Konan N'Dri is replacing Smail Prevljak for Eupen at Lotto Park.
Vincent Kompany (Anderlecht) is making a first substitution, with Nany Dimata replacing Marco Kana.
In the minute 71, Anderlecht take a 1-0 lead thanks to Albert Sambi Lokonga.
Jeremy Doku with an assist there.
Francis Amuzu is on a sub for Mustapha Bundu for Anderlecht.
In the minute 77, The away team replace Jens Cools with Victor Vazquez.
Eupen's Stef Peeters has been booked in Brussels.
Vincent Kompany is making the team's third substitution at Lotto Park with Anouar Ait El Hadj replacing Jeremy Doku.
In the minute 89, Menno Koch (Eupen) has received a yellow card from Kevin Dhondt.
The match has come to a close in Brussels. The final score is 1-1.
Julien Ngoy levels the score at 1-1.
Anouar Ait El Hadj (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
At Lotto Park, Victor Vazquez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
